newsArray.title: Liverpool ease past Milan on return to UCL
creator: Reuters
newsArray.description: Liverpool celebrated their return to the Champions League after a year's absence with a 3-1 victory over AC Milan at San Siro on Tuesday, overcoming a shaky start with goals from Ibrahima Konate, Virgil van Dijk and Dominik Szoboszlai.

newsArray.title: Kane nets 4, passes Rooney in record Bayern rout
newsArray.description: MUNICH -- Harry Kane scored four times on Tuesday to bring his Champions League goal total to 34, blowing past the previous record of 30 set by Wayne Rooney for the most goals by an English player in the competition.

newsArray.title: Postecoglou urges Tottenham to take trophy ‘opportunity’ in Carabao Cup
creator: Jacob Steinberg
newsArray.description: ‘I don’t want to wait four years. This year’s an opportunity’Spurs visit Coventry in Carabao Cup on WednesdayAnge Postecoglou has urged Tottenham to embrace the challenge of trying to end their long trophy drought and said he is happy to be regarded as a failure if he does not win anything this season.The Australian was in a defiant mood before visiting Coventry in the third round of the Carabao Cup on Wednesday night and is determined to maintain his record of lifting silverware in his second year in a job. Continue reading...
